:v-model.description: The initial value of the binding value, which is bound in both directions
:v-model.description_zh: 绑定value初始值，此值是双向绑定的

type.description: For the type of input box, see the description above
type.description_zh: 输入框类型，见上方说明

disabled.description: Whether to disable the input field

clearable.description: Whether to display a clear control

password.description: Whether the password type is or not

maxlength.description: The maximum input length is set to -1 without limiting the maximum length
maxlength.description_zh: 最大输入长度，设置为 -1 的时候不限制最大长度

placeholder.description: A placeholder when the input box is empty
placeholder.description_zh: 输入框为空时的占位符

placeholderClass.description: 指定placeholder的样式类，注意页面或组件的style中写了scoped时，需要在类名前写/deep/
placeholderClass.description_zh: 指定placeholder的样式类，注意页面或组件的style中写了scoped时，需要在类名前写/deep/

placeholderStyle.description: 指定placeholder的样式，字符串/对象形式，如"color: red;"
placeholderStyle.description_zh: 指定placeholder的样式，字符串/对象形式，如"color: red;"

showWordLimit.description: Whether or not to display the input word count is only valid if type = "text" or type = "textarea".
showWordLimit.description_zh: 是否显示输入字数统计，只在 type ="text"或type ="textarea"时有效

confirmType.description: Set the text of the button in the lower right corner, and the compatibility is detailed in the uni-app documentation
confirmType.description_zh: 设置右下角按钮的文字，兼容性详见uni-app文档

confirmHold.description: When you click the button in the lower right corner of the keyboard, whether to keep the keyboard unfolded, H5 is invalid
confirmHold.description_zh: 点击键盘右下角按钮时是否保持键盘不收起，H5无效

holdKeyboard.description: focus, do not put away the keyboard when clicking on the page, and the WeChat Mini Program is effective
holdKeyboard.description_zh: focus时，点击页面的时候不收起键盘，微信小程序有效

focus.description: Automatically get focus, whether it can focus on the H5 platform and whether the soft keyboard pops up depends on the implementation of the current browser itself. NVUE pages are not supported, and you need to use the focus() and blur() methods of the component to control the focus
focus.description_zh: 自动获取焦点，在 H5 平台能否聚焦以及软键盘是否跟随弹出，取决于当前浏览器本身的实现。nvue 页面不支持，需使用组件的 focus()、blur() 方法控制焦点

autoBlur.description: When the keyboard is folded, whether it automatically loses focus or not, currently only App 3.0.0+ is effective
autoBlur.description_zh: 键盘收起时，是否自动失去焦点，目前仅App3.0.0+有效

ignoreCompositionEvent.description: Whether to ignore the handling of text composition system events within the component. If false, the compositionstart, compositionend, and compositionupdate events will be fired, and the input event will be triggered during text compositing
ignoreCompositionEvent.description_zh: 是否忽略组件内对文本合成系统事件的处理。为 false 时将触发 compositionstart、compositionend、compositionupdate 事件，且在文本合成期间会触发 input 事件

disableDefaultPadding.description: Whether to remove the default padding under iOS, only WeChat Mini Program, and type=textarea is valid
disableDefaultPadding.description_zh: 是否去掉 iOS 下的默认内边距，仅微信小程序，且type=textarea时有效

cursor.description: Specify the position of the cursor when focusing

cursorSpacing.description: The distance between the bottom of the input box and the keyboard when focused
cursorSpacing.description_zh: 输入框聚焦时底部与键盘的距离

selectionStart.description: Cursor start position, effective when auto-gathering, needs to be used with selection-end
selectionStart.description_zh: 光标起始位置，自动聚集时有效，需与selection-end搭配使用

selectionEnd.description: The cursor end position is valid when auto-gathering, and needs to be used in conjunction with selection-start
selectionEnd.description_zh: 光标结束位置，自动聚集时有效，需与selection-start搭配使用

adjustPosition.description: When the keyboard pops up, whether the page is automatically pushed up
adjustPosition.description_zh: 键盘弹起时，是否自动上推页面

fontSize.description: The size of the font in the input box

color.description: Enter the font color of the input box

prefixIcon.description: The input box is preceded by an icon

prefixIconStyle.description: Prepend icon style, object or string
prefixIconStyle.description_zh: 前置图标样式，对象或字符串

suffixIconStyle.description: Followed by an icon style, object or string
suffixIconStyle.description_zh: 后置图标样式，对象或字符串

border.description: Border type, surround - surrounded by frame, bottom - bottom border, none - borderless
border.description_zh: 边框类型，surround-四周边框，bottom-底部边框，none-无边框

readonly.description: Read-only or not, unlike disabled, is that disabled will be grayed out, while readonly will not
readonly.description_zh: 是否只读，与disabled不同之处在于disabled会置灰组件，而readonly则不会

shape.description: Enter the box shape, circle-circle, square-square

formatter.description: Input filtering or formatting functions (if you need to be compatible with WeChat Mini Programs, you can only use the setFormatter method)
formatter.description_zh: 输入过滤或格式化函数(如需兼容微信小程序，则只能通过setFormatter方法)

customStyle.description: Define the exterior styles that need to be used
customStyle.description_zh: 定义需要用到的外部样式

events.name: blur
events.description: Triggered when the input box loses focus
events.description_zh: 输入框失去焦点时触发

events.name: focus
events.description: Triggered when the input box is focused

events.name: confirm
events.description: Triggered when the Done button is clicked

events.name: keyboardheightchange
events.description: This event is triggered when the keyboard height changes
events.description_zh: 键盘高度发生变化的时候触发此事件

events.name: input
events.description: This event is triggered by a change in content
events.description_zh: 内容发生变化触发此事件

events.name: change
events.description: This event is triggered by a change in content
events.description_zh: 内容发生变化触发此事件

slots.name: prefix
slots.description: The input box is preceded by u--input in the nuve environment and U-input in the non-nvue environment
slots.description_zh: 输入框前置内容，nuve环境需u--input有效，非nvue环境需u-input才有效

slots.name: suffix
slots.description: The content at the end of the input box is valid for the nuve environment and u-input for the non-nvue environment
slots.description_zh: 输入框后置内容，nuve环境需u--input有效，非nvue环境需u-input才有效
